cleaned_text: HOW Dr Suzanne Humphries on Vaccination and infant Immunity Part 2 April 14 2015 by Heart of Wellness published on 2015-04-20T13:43:25Z Today Dr. Suzanne Humphries joins the conversation to discuss her co-authored book Dissolving Illusions discussion the impact of vaccinations on the infant immune system and the long term effects of this type to toxic conditioning.
